solution_line_template: The interest on the loan is {interest_rate_decimal}*{loan_amount}=$<<{interest_rate_decimal}*{loan_amount}={interest_amount}>>{interest_amount}
The total amount Jack needs to pay back is {loan_amount}+{interest_amount}=<<{loan_amount}+{interest_amount}={total_payback_amount}>>{total_payback_amount}
